channel.title: Annaprasanna on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Annaprasanna on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Fifth Month
item.description: May 17- June 16 By 5th month slowly started introducing solid food like banana and apple puree to Aarush. According to our custom till “Annaprasanna” we are not suppose to introduce solid food like rice or wheat to baby. And his didu was also against using common baby food item like “Cerelac” as they contain rice or wheat. This resulted in his first solid bite being fruit – mashed banana. The first spoon he swallowed as my mom fed him, but little man has a frown of disapproval, like “what the heck they are feeding me?
